name: sports-card-ai-agent
description: An intelligent multi-agent system for analyzing and trading sports cards using AI, built with LangChain, LangGraph, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

scripts.cap:build:android:debug: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.cap:build:android:release: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.build:all: npx cap sync && cd android && ./gradlew.bat assembleRelease
